mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT menuClassification FROM menu_tbl where storeCode = #{storeCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu_tbl (storeCode, menuName, menuPrice, menuImage, menuContent, menuClassification, menuStatus) VALUES (#{storeCode},#{menuName},#{menuPrice},#{menuImage},#{menuContent},#{menuClassification},#{menuStatus});
mapper.update: UPDATE menu_tbl SET menuName = #{menuName}, menuPrice = #{menuPrice}, menuImage = #{menuImage}, menuContent = #{menuContent}, menuStatus = #{menuStatus} WHERE menuCode = #{menuCode}
